Parameters: user id

Parameters: user id

Accepts group invite request. 
 Parameters : groupname

english.Sets Do not disturb mode and no notifica: Sets Do not disturb mode and no notifications will be shown. Parameters: true
english.As the moderator, destroys your current: As the moderator, destroys your current active group.

Recalls a message based on the given number.
Parameters: the number of most recently sent message to recall.

english.Print out the names of all of my friends: Print out the names of all of my friends.

english.As the moderator of your active group, k:
As the moderator of your active group, kick a member from your group.

You can translate any sentence 
Parameters: language to translate it to
english.Search for users starting with similar s:
Search for users starting with similar search term.
